snippet: While the president still has plenty of fans at Allen & Company's annual gathering of media and technology magnates, some who were once ardent supporters of the president last time are ready to switch their vote to Mitt Romney.
abstract: While the president still has plenty of fans at Allen & Company's annual gathering of media and technology magnates, some who were once ardent supporters of the president last time are ready to switch their vote to Mitt Romney.

byline.original: By EVELYN M. RUSLI and AMY CHOZICK

headline.main: Among Moguls, Affection for Obama Wanes
